comments:
When importing remote apache access log, the UI shows only 31 log records
although the log file has more than 1600 records.

I was using this driver: 4.0.0-200506211419.  The RAC was on AIX.

When using 3.3 Workbench, the Log UI showing past the 31st record using the same
RAC.  This is a regression.

Local import works fine.

I am attaching the access.log file.

Created an attachment (id=23673)
Apache access.log file

Here are the exceptions that written to the eclipse console (lots of them):

Thread[TCPDataFiller,6,main] - org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: An invalid XML 
character (Unicode: 0x0) was found in the element content of the document.
	at org.apache.xerces.util.ErrorHandlerWrapper.createSAXParseException
(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.util.ErrorHandlerWrapper.fatalError(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.impl.XMLErrorReporter.reportError(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.impl.XMLErrorReporter.reportError(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.impl.XMLScanner.reportFatalError(Unknown Source)
	at 
org.apache.xerces.impl.XMLDocumentFragmentScannerImpl$FragmentContentDispatcher.
dispatch(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.impl.XMLDocumentFragmentScannerImpl.scanDocument
(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.parsers.XMLParser.parse(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.parsers.AbstractSAXParser.parse(Unknown Source)
	at javax.xml.parsers.SAXParser.parse(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.SAXFragmentHandler.parse
(SAXFragmentHandler.java:192)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.SAXFragmentHandler$1.run
(SAXFragmentHandler.java:60)

Note, Hendra was using the static Apache access log parser to import the log 
file.

Same problem occurs with remote import from Agent Controller on Windows machine 
so it appears not to be platform specific.

Created an attachment (id=23695)
Patch attached.

The messages are larger then the buffer size 64K! and the remaining data was
not computed correctly in this case.

traces.message: An invalid XML  character (Unicode: 0x0) was found in the element content of the document.
